control_sets.title: Starting a KalturaSession
control_sets.tip:
Start a KalturaSession (ks) by supplying your Partner ID and Admin Secret.

You can find your info in the [Kaltura Management Console](http://kmc.kaltura.com/index.php/kmc/kmc4#account|integration)

control_sets.title: Viewing your Notification Templates
control_sets.tip: Notification Templates can be used to send you an e-mail or call a particular URL under certain conditions, e.g. when a new video is uploaded. Use ```eventNotificationTemplate.list``` to get a list of your current templates.
